snippet: If Monday’s events are any indication, the opposition coalition in Venezuela could have difficulty holding together after its historic election victory as it tries to solve the country’s big problems.
abstract: Venezuelan opposition coalition wins large majority in National Assembly election, in solid rebuke of Nicolas Maduro's left-wing government; handful of disparate parties known as Democratic Unity hopes to revive reeling economy with more liberal policies; latent rifts in coalition could return in struggle for power if Maduro is eventually ousted.
lead_paragraph: If Monday’s events are any indication, the opposition coalition in Venezuela could have difficulty holding together after its historic election victory as it tries to solve the country’s big problems.

headline.main: Big Challenges Lie Ahead for a Delicate Winning Alliance in Venezuela
headline.print_headline: Big Challenges Lie Ahead for a Delicate Winning Alliance in Venezuela
